rules_text:
First strike, menace, trample
[i]Choose A Path [/i]– As Lyn, Hector & Eliwood enters, choose first strike, menace or trample. Other creatures you control have the chosen ability.
[i]Seize the Throne[/i] – When Lyn, Hector & Eliwood enters, create a Throne token and attach it to target Noble you control.
